name: Digman
description:
Developed in the scope of the itch.io GBJAM (sadly it could not be submitted to the submissions page in time, due to unexpected circumstances).

Digman is a 2d platformer where the only safe way to go is down. Try to keep yourself alive by digging 'till your arms fall off. Or you drown.

Authors:
David Ferreira (@BenjaminFlor)
Pedro Lucas (@OrdepSacul)
